mission_data.playerShipNames_arme: TSN Sabre\TSN Valiant\TSN Lancer\TSN Stalker\TSN Viper\TSN Horizon\TSN Necessity\TSN Hunter

set_ship_text.name: Hulca Smelters
set_ship_text.desc: Enyalius' main industrial base, processing ore and denabite from the highly productive asteroid mines in the sector.

set_ship_text.name: DS-1126
set_ship_text.desc: Unusually well-defended USFP deep space station.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The Station Commander is a battle-tested marine who likes to give TSN ships a hard time in good fun.

set_ship_text.name: Procanthi
set_ship_text.desc: Industrial hub of the sector, fabricating a wide range of ship and station parts from ores imported from Tibur.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The station chief is friendly to anyone willing to do business here (and pay the station fees).

set_ship_text.name: Polydeukes Market
set_ship_text.desc: Civilian trading post and refit station. Primarily deals in imported ores, which are stored in the large zero-gravity ore vaults.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The station director was appointed through nepotism and is largely considered a total nut-job. The day-to-day operations are handled by the chief of staff.
set_ship_text.hailtext: (In the background, you hear someone singing very loudly and very off-key.)

set_ship_text.name: Helios Habitat
set_ship_text.desc: Civilian base originally set up to house survivors of the Helios Massacre, now a permanent habitat.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The station is struggling to keep its population over the minimum threshold, since many inhabitants choose to emigrate.

set_ship_text.name: Helios Memorial
set_ship_text.desc: Art installation set up in memory of the Helios Massacre, where a Hegemony strike force used a bioweapon to make Planet Helios uninhabitable, killing millions.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The art installation is not inhabited and has no power signature.

set_ship_text.name: Semelei Processors
set_ship_text.desc: Private industrial enterprise processing raw ore into more usable forms.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The station chief is probably tied to organized crime.
set_ship_text.hailtext: Why yes, would you like to export some of our processed minerals?

set_ship_text.name: Zarkov Labs
set_ship_text.desc: Center for scientific missions in-system, doubles as gate control.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: The station chief will not shut up about weird conspiracy theories involving wandering planets.
set_ship_text.hailtext: Ming the Merciless is coming for us! He will destroy our planets! I warned them, but nobody would listen.
